Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Michigan/Wacker
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Columbus, South Water, and Michigan due to, street blockage near Michigan/Wacker.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Columbus, South Water, and Michigan due to, street blockage near Michigan/Wacker.

Allow extra travel time.
